entry.title: Spring Data REST PATCH Request Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Spring Data REST PATCH Request Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2017-8046

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Spring Data REST < 2.6.9和3.0.1，Spring Boot < 1.5.9和2.0 M6存在远程代码执行漏洞，攻击者可以通过发送恶意的PATCH请求，利用特制的JSON数据执行任意Java代码。

产品厂商： pivotal_software

产品名称： Spring Data REST

影响版本： < 2.6.9 (Ingalls SR9), < 3.0.1 (Kay SR1)

搜索语法： http.title:”eureka”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/c0f86b0eb52e166e96b9bc82185c419c768ddb30/http%2Fcves%2F2017%2FCVE-2017-8046.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: Roundcube Webmail 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-49113

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail 存在一个反序列化漏洞，允许认证攻击者在服务器上执行任意代码。影响版本包括1.5.0至1.5.9和1.6.0至1.6.10。

产品厂商： Roundcube

产品名称： Roundcube Webmail

影响版本： 1.5.0 - 1.5.9, 1.6.0 - 1.6.10

来源： https://github.com/BiiTts/Roundcube-CVE-2025-49113

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • generate_gadget.php
  • requirements.txt
  • roundcube_exploit.py

来源概述

BiiT - Roundcube RCE Exploit (CVE-2025-49113)

Um exploit proof-of-concept para CVE-2025-49113, uma vulnerabilidade de execução remota de código no Roundcube Webmail.

Descrição

Este exploit visa uma vulnerabilidade de desserialização no Roundcube Webmail nas versões 1.5.0 até 1.6.10. A vulnerabilidade permite que um atacante autenticado execute código arbitrário no servidor.

Versões Vulneráveis

  • 1.5.0 - 1.5.9
  • 1.6.0 - 1.6.10

Requisitos

  • Python 3.7 ou superior
  • Bibliotecas Python listadas em requirements.txt

Instalação

Uso

Parâmetros

  • <url>: URL base da instalação do Roundcube (ex: http://localhost/roundcube/)
  • <username>: Nome de usuário do Roundcube
  • <password>: Senha do Roundcube
  • <command>: Comando a ser executado no sistema alvo

Exemplo

Aviso Legal

Este exploit é fornecido apenas para fins educacionais e de teste. O uso deste exploit contra sistemas sem autorização é ilegal. O autor não se responsabiliza pelo uso indevido deste código.

Características

  • Verificação automática da versão do Roundcube
  • Exploração da vulnerabilidade de desserialização
  • Suporte a SSL/TLS (com verificação desativada para testes)

Créditos

  • Desenvolvido por: BiiT
  • CVE: 2025-49113
  • Vulnerabilidade: Roundcube Webmail RCE

漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail 远程代码执行漏洞

entry.title: GeoServer Vulnerable to Unauthenticated SSRF via TestWfsPost
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5gw5-jccf-6hxw

仓库 Star： 4052

CVSS 评分： 7.5

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/security/advisories/GHSA-5gw5-jccf-6hxw

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-40822

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11390

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11794

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5gw5-jccf-6hxw

描述：

Summary

It possible to achieve Service Side Request Forgery (SSRF) via the Demo request endpoint if Proxy Base URL has not been set.

Details

A unauthenticated user can supply a request that will be issued by the server. This can be used to enumerate internal networks and also in the case of cloud instances can be used to obtain sensitive data.

Mitigation

  1. When using GeoServer with a proxy, manage the proxy base value as a system administrator, use the application property PROXY_BASE_URL to provide a non-empty value that cannot be overridden by the user interface or incoming request.

  2. When using GeoServer directly without a proxy, block all access to TestWfsPost by editing the web.xml file. Adding this block right before the end:

Resolution

Upgrading to GeoServer 2.24.4, or 2.25.2, removes the TestWfsPost servlet resolving this issue.

The demo request page functionality is now implemented directly in the browser.

Reference

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11794
  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11390
  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-40822
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5gw5-jccf-6hxw

entry.title: GeoServer has improper ENTITY_RESOLUTION_ALLOWLIST URI validation in XML Processing (SSRF)
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-mc43-4fqr-c965

仓库 Star： 4052

CVSS 评分： 9.3

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/security/advisories/GHSA-mc43-4fqr-c965

  • https://docs.geoserver.org/latest/en/user/production/config.html#production-config-external-entities

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-mc43-4fqr-c965

描述：

Summary

An improper URI validation vulnerability exists that enables an unauthorized attacker to perform XML External Entities (XEE) attack, then send GET request to any HTTP server. Attacker can abuse this to scan internal networks and gain information about them then exploit further. Moreover, attacker can read limited .xsd file on system.

Details

By default, GeoServer use PreventLocalEntityResolver class from GeoTools to filter out malicious URIs in XML entities before resolving them. The URI must match the regex (?i)(jar:file|http|vfs)[^?#;]*\\.xsd. But the regex leaves a chance for attackers to request to any HTTP server or limited file.

Impact

An unauthenticated attacker can:

  1. Scan internal network to gain insight about it and exploit further.
  2. SSRF to endpoint ends with .xsd.
  3. Read limited .xsd file on system.

Mitigation

  1. Define the system property ENTITY_RESOLUTION_ALLOWLIST to limit the supported external schema locaitons.
  2. The built-in allow list covers the locations required for the operation of OGC web services: www.w3.org,schemas.opengis.net,www.opengis.net,inspire.ec.europa.eu/schemas.
  3. The user guide provides details on how to add additional locations (this is required for app-schema plugin where a schema is supplied to define an output format).

Resolution

  1. GeoServer 2.25.0 and greater default to the use of ENTITY_RESOLUTION_ALLOWLIST and does not require you to provide a system property.
  2. The use of ENTITY_RESOLUTION_ALLOWLIST is still supported if you require additional schema locations to be supported beyond the built-in allow list.
  3. GeoServer 2.25.1 change ENTITY_RESOLUTION_ALLOWLIST no longer supports regular expressions

References

  • External Entities Resolution (GeoServer User Guide)

Credits

  • Le Mau Anh Phong from VNG Security Response Center & VNUHCM - University of Information Technology
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-mc43-4fqr-c965

entry.title: GWC Home Page communicate version and revision information
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jm79-7xhw-6f6f

仓库 Star： 4052

CVSS 评分： 5.3

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/security/advisories/GHSA-jm79-7xhw-6f6f

  • https://github.com/GeoWebCache/geowebcache/issues/1344

  • https://github.com/GeoWebCache/geowebcache/pull/1345

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/pull/8189

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11677

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jm79-7xhw-6f6f

描述：

Summary

The GeoWebCache home page includes version and revision information about the software in use. This information is sensitive from a security point of view because it allows software used by the server to be easily identified.

Details

org.geowebcache.GeoWebCacheDispatcher.handleFrontPage(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) has no check to hide potentially sensitive information from users except for a hidden system property to hide the storage locations that defaults to showing the locations.

PoC

Just open http://localhost:8080/geoserver/gwc/

Impact

In addition to exposing the version and revision information, the home page will expose the config file and storage locations which may expose the system’s temp directory location and whether or not GeoServer is running in a Windows operating system. The approximate server start time and some basic GWC usage information is also exposed.

References

https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11677
https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/pull/8189
https://github.com/GeoWebCache/geowebcache/issues/1344
https://github.com/GeoWebCache/geowebcache/pull/1345
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jm79-7xhw-6f6f

entry.title: Coverage REST API Server Side Request Forgery
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-r4hf-r8gj-jgw2

仓库 Star： 4052

CVSS 评分： 5.5

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/security/advisories/GHSA-r4hf-r8gj-jgw2

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11468

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11717

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-r4hf-r8gj-jgw2

描述：

Summary

The Coverage rest api /workspaces/{workspaceName}/coveragestores/{storeName}/{method}.{format} allow to upload file with a specified url (with {method} equals ‘url’) with no restrict.

Details

The Coverage rest api /workspaces/{workspaceName}/coveragestores/{storeName}/{method}.{format} allow to upload file with a specified url (with {method} equals ‘url’). But this url has not been check with URL Checks feature.

For example, should add the code below to check fileURL:

The vulnerable code was RESTUtils.java

Impact

This vulnerability presents the opportunity for Server Side Request Forgery.

References

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11468
  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11717
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-r4hf-r8gj-jgw2

entry.title: Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object Deserialization
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object Deserialization

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-49113

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail在1.5.10之前和1.6.x在1.6.11之前的版本中，由于program/actions/settings/upload.php中的_from参数未经验证，导致PHP对象反序列化漏洞。攻击者可以通过此漏洞以Web服务器权限执行任意系统命令。

产品厂商： Roundcube

产品名称： Roundcube Webmail

影响版本： version <= 1.5.10 and 1.6.x < 1.6.11

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/8fe5c91801626d7f0be8f4e74ffb8fc9cc44477d/modules%2Fexploits%2Fmulti%2Fhttp%2Froundcube_auth_rce_cve_2025_49113.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

POC详情

漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object

entry.title: Yealink 默认用户凭证漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Yealink 默认用户凭证漏洞

漏洞类型： 弱口令

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： Yealink设备除了默认的admin:admin凭证外，大多数设备还预装了另一个默认用户，用户名为”user”，密码也为”user”。虽然这不是管理员账户，但仍可用于对设备进行更改。此漏洞可能导致未授权访问。

产品厂商： Yealink

产品名称： Yealink devices

搜索语法： title=”Yealink T53W”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12287

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Except for admin:admin, most of the Yealink devices ship with another default user where the username and password is set to “user”. Although this is not an administrator, it can be still used to make changes in the device. I’ve created the following template that checks for this issue:
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Yealink 默认用户凭证漏洞

漏洞类型：</
